President Trump: s claim that Nancy Pelosi came out in favor of MS-13 is not supported by any evidence or direct statement from Pelosi herself.
Pelosi: s comments about "calling people animals is not a good thing" were in reference to Trump's general characterization of undocumented immigrants, not specifically MS-13 gang members.
Pelosi defended: undocumented immigrants" and emphasized the belief in the "spark of divinity in every person on Earth," suggesting that she does not support or defend violent gang members.
The expert: s verdict concludes that Trump distorted the facts and that Pelosi's interpretation of Trump's words at the roundtable was least favorable to him, but it does not mean she was embracing violent gang members.
